faq-gyd-K3e6TuJP.q: Does "Energy Drain" require a non-immune enemy hero in range for my team to be able to regain 1 spent Life counter?
faq-gyd-K3e6TuJP.a:
Yes, you need to be able to target a hero first.
"If able" after a comma makes the preceding step non-mandatory (p. 17), so it only applies to the "discard" step of the instructions.
